dc.title: USGS Geography: The National Map
dc.description: The U.S. Geological Survey is committed to realigning and reinvigorating its topographic mapping activities to put truly current information into the hands of our customers, in a cost-effective way. By working with partners, we will ensure that the Nation has access to and use of current, accurate, and nationally consistent base geographic information, including digital data and derived topographic maps.
